opium dens supposedly frequented by a

this heroin made its grand entrance

heroin wasn't non-addictive at all in

altering effects so how does it work
when injected or smoked the active
chemical compound in heroin diamorphine
is able to reach the brain quickly via

connections called synaptic at the

binds to specific opioid receptors and
that triggers the release of dopamine
one of your so-called feel-good hormones
as more and more heroin reaches the

something that's often described as a
rush of euphoria and while that might
not sound too bad it's only the tip of

what follows is much more dangerous and

the brain
you risk coma and brain damage that

that's because just like its

change your brain and your behavior
forever tolerance is where the intensity
of the drugs affects decrease each time

whenever you don't have hair

the critical pathways between the
